title: BlendJet 2
description: BlendJet 2 is the Next-Gen Blender and serves up big blender power on the go. We created the BlendJet 2 portable blender so you can make anything you want, anywhere in the world — from a mountaintop to your kitchen countertop. It’s easy and convenient to use at home, at work, outdoors, at the gym, in the car, at the beach, on vacation or wherever the day takes you.

Teresa H.
So far I love it.
Heather G.
We are full time RV’ers so when I saw the ad for the BlendJet I had to give it a try! Love that it’s made in the USA. It works great, as advertised, sometimes you need to run it two or three times but the battery life is great! I make smoothies and fun blended cocktails with it. Easy self cleaning process as advertised! (1 spin w soap and done if you clean right after use)

Christine D.
I was so skeptical of the Blendjet. I saw ads everywhere, and while I was having issues with my own mini blender for my smoothies I wasn't ready to take the plunge yet. Eventually I thought 'why not?' And decided to try it on a whim. It is, without a doubt, the best purchase I've ever made for my daily use. I make smoothies during the day, protein shakes and blended matcha lattes during the afternoons and evenings. Because it holds up to 15 charges, it's perfect to take to work as well if you keep some fruit on hand with water and yogurt. I've recommended it to my fiance, my best friend, anyone I know who could use it. I also use it to puree and mix pasta sauce as well.
Marcene A.
I love my new BlendJet. It's fast and efficient and easy to clean. What more can you ask?

I can’t believe I waited so long to buy this. I finally treated myself and splurged a little and... I absolutely love my Blendjet 2! I use it everyday. I’m an ER travel nurse and I travel with it for every assignment. It’s so convenient and easy to clean. I love how it blends ice so easily. Best thing ever!
